summary_gpt: The filing announces a scheduled Board meeting on May 10, 2025, to approve the company's audited financial results for Q4 and FY2025 and to consider dividend recommendations. It also notes the continuation of the trading window closure for insiders until after the results are published.

Triveni Turbine Limited has announced an earnings conference call scheduled for May 12, 2025, to discuss Q4 and FY 2024-25 financial results, with details available on their website and via pre-registration. The company specializes in industrial heat and power solutions, including renewable turbines up to 100 MW.
